entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
